A

a - Variable in class Simfile
An array of doubles containing each BPM in the simfile along with the time in beats in which they occur.
accuracy - Variable in class PanelEnd
Combined accuracy of all arrows pressed during the game
accuracyLabel - Variable in class PanelPlay
The label which displays how accurately you pressed the arrows, as a percentage.

The function that runs based on the timer.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class PanelPlay.ArrowAction
Displays what arrow is being pressed (by adding brightness to the judgement arrows) based on direction

Displays what arrow is being pressed (by adding brightness to the judgement arrows) based on direction

Goes back, changes selected song, or plays selected song based on the key that was pressed.

active - Variable in class PanelPlay
A list of all the arrows as sprites.
addNote(int) - Method in class PanelPlay
Adds an arrow's score to the total list of scores.
addnoteindex() - Method in class PanelPlay
A function that adds to the note index variable, in case variables must be static within a function.
adjustSongVolume() - Method in class PanelPlay
Changes the song's volume (loudness) based on user-defined settings
arraySize - Variable in class PanelPlay
The array size of the arrow coordinate arrays.
ArrowAction(String) - Constructor for class PanelPlay.ArrowAction
Creates an ArrowAction object and puts the arrow key direction into a class variable
arrowPath - Variable in class PanelPlay
The path where sprites are located.
Artist() - Method in class Simfile
Returns the artist of the song as a String, which is specified in the simfile.
AudioFile() - Method in class Simfile
Returns the audio file as a String, which is specified in the simfile.
audioThread - Variable in class PanelPlay
The thread that plays the audio stream (music).
